title: Alefaa Blockchain
author: Alefaa Blockchain
content: We are happy to announce that the ABTC bounty program for TalkiHero.com has started!!!Please read this doc for the details for the bounty program:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xnEzWQZO0remrYGmdpCIhjPrGKo_afYtprhe8DVyXl8/editDiscord for the bounty program for learnershttps://discord.com/invite/mCwM4dfAWmDiscord for the bounty program for tutorshttps://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7GhtPlease note: You need to submit this application first before your referred tutor is registered on TalkiHero.com.https://forms.gle/Q8St9gyQN34yf6nB9Contact us: info@alefaa.comICO post link in BitcoinTalki.orghttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409023.new#newTelgram Grouphttps://t.me/+mfPbRlijCHE5MjcxWelcome to join the official channel in Discord.https://discord.gg/AEDAjtdAFor the bounty program of TalkiHero, pls join the channel of DiscordFor learners: https://discord.gg/zNJdEnJMFor tutors:   https://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7Ght

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Quote from: Nobrais123 on August 10, 2022, 04:33:34 PMWhat?Hi,It's the bounty program for talkihero.comWe will have other bounty programs too.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: August 11, 2022, 11:51:25 PMLast edit: August 15, 2022, 01:07:22 AM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: We are happy to announce that the ABTC bounty program for TalkiHero.com has started!!!Please read this doc for the details for the bounty program:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xnEzWQZO0remrYGmdpCIhjPrGKo_afYtprhe8DVyXl8/editBounty program for learnershttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1Iq-uN03qQNnEPiVTWD5WvXpwcfHYNiAK/viewBounty program for tutorshttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1lUSZ7dCUYCZJZ9bflWa5nZHwvBWaG-U7/viewPlease note: You need to submit this application first before your referred tutor is registered on TalkiHero.com.https://forms.gle/Q8St9gyQN34yf6nB9Contact us: info@alefaa.comICO post link in BitcoinTalki.orghttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409023.new#newTelgram Grouphttps://t.me/+mfPbRlijCHE5MjcxWelcome to join the official channel in Discord.https://discord.gg/AEDAjtdAFor the bounty program of TalkiHero, pls join the channel of DiscordFor learners: https://discord.gg/zNJdEnJMFor tutors:   https://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7Ght

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Sep. 12,Alefaa-Bitcoin will be distributed based on each member’s contribution. We created a form to follow up all the distribution records, to let everyone know that every ABTC has been rewarded in a fair way.Please check the following form for more details.https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yBluCpRKvdTETeQpZqmiK6LImz8fHl5D/edit#gid=1498222045

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Sep. 25,Dear Alefaa-Bitcoin users,We have updated the technical information in the following link, and the official wallet and mining phase will be published soon, our team is finalizing the mainnet, please be patient for the new announcement of the new release. Thanks for your understanding.https://github.com/AlefaaBitcoin/alefaabitcoin/blob/main/README.md

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Sep. 30,Dear Alefaa-Bitcoin users,The Telegram group now is public, anyone can join the group without invitation, the link is as below:https://t.me/AlefaaBitcoin

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: October 07, 2022, 01:22:04 AMLast edit: October 20, 2022, 01:34:17 AM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Oct. 12th,GOOD NEWS,Our developers have updated the Alefaa-Blockchain to a POS+POW consensus system algorithm, the Genesis block has been created, and we are doing internal testing. We will keep the public informed when we have the new updates.

comments.author: Alefaa Blockchain
comments.body: Update Oct. 13th,Whitepaper 4.0 is released! Pls check the details in the following link:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zRTNI0S5B2PatwnzSbvQsnoILdYGk5zJ/view

comments.author: Alefaa Blockchain
comments.body: Update Oct. 20th,Dear Alefaa Blockchain users:The explorer of Alefaa-Bitcoin is live, pls check the details from the following link:http://explorer.alefaa.orgWe are developing the mining pool, when it’s ready, we will give new updates for it.And we missed the information for the reward of PoS, the total reward in 2029 for PoS will be 1 million ABTC, it will be distributed to each ABTC address by its percentage of the ABTC amounts.IntroductionAlefaa-Bitcoin is a form of digital online money using blockchain technology that can be easily transferred globally, instantly, and with near zero fees;Alefaa-Bitcoin incorporates market leading securtiy & Privacy and is PoS (Proof of Stake) Cryptocurrency;Alefaa-Bitcoin utilizes a Proof of Stake (PoS) consensus system algorithm, and plus a Proof of Work (PoW) consensus system algorithm, allowing all owners of Alefaa-Bitcoin to participate in earning block rewards while securing the network with full node wallets, as well as to run Masternodes to create and vote on proposals;Alefaa-Bitcoin has a total pre-mined ABTC of 20,856,000, and kept 144,000 ABTC to be mined during Oct. 2022 and Oct. 2029;In October 2029, when the mining phase is reached, then another 1 million of ABTC will be distributed by the percentage of the holding amount;Although it’s not a share of any Alefaa companies, up to 50% of the business profits will be used to purchase the ABTC from the market.

comments.author: Alefaa Blockchain
comments.body: Update Oct. 23th,GREAT NEWS!The Alefaa-Bitcoin wallet has been released, and you can mine ABTC with the CPU now. Please join the group in Telegram, so you will get the ABTC wallet, we will send the wallet software in the TG group only, and we will publish the wallet to the public in 100 days, which will be in February, 2023.https://t.me/AlefaaBitcoin

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 06th,GOOD NEWS!The official public mining pool is now published, pls check below:Pool.alefaa.org

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: November 08, 2022, 07:35:20 PMLast edit: November 17, 2022, 05:31:40 PM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 08th,Up to Nov.08th, 2022, the active mining hash rate of ABTC is about 3.1T.According to the electricity cost at $0.1/KW, currently the electricity cost for ABTC mining hash rate is about $30,171/month.As the monthly mining income will be 1714 ABTC, so the min. market value up to Nov.08th, 2022, would be $30,171/1714 ABTC = $17.60/ABTC.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 09th,Twitter account is just created, all future update will be posted there, please check the link and follow:https://twitter.com/AlefaaBitcoin

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: November 14, 2022, 04:48:37 PMLast edit: November 14, 2022, 06:37:23 PM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 14th,Event: 2 million ABTC will be destroyed.Reason to destroy: 2 million of BTC were frozen due to the loss of the private key.We will update the wallet address of the 2 million of ABTC to be destroyed.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 17th,ABTC hashrate weekly update!The average mining hash rate of ABTC on Nov.17th, 2022 is about 15T.Currently the estimated electricity cost for ABTC mining hash rate is about $137,143/month.The monthly mining income will be 1714 ABTC, so the estimated market value up to Nov.17th, 2022, would be $600,000/1714 ABTC = $80/ABTC.Please note: The mining hash rate changes from time to time, and this estimated calculation is not an investment suggestion, anyone should bear the investment risks according to his/her own responsibility.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Update Nov. 22th,Total 1,837,592 ABTC have been destroyed in the following 2 wallet addresses, due to the stake reward in 2029 will be 8.8381%, so a total of 2,000,000 ABTC have been destroyed up to date.Destroy01AUrwcARd31GfE2NLxqjGtBiKN35aECqe577592Destroy02AdphPkhhy3RTkzdbC6kqa6KqbKN9uWqWsi1830000
